title: Products collection GET schema
description: A schema for retrieval of a collection of products.

costPrice.description: The cost of the goods. If you have the inventory module enabled, this is read-only and will just be ignored.

recommendedPrice.description: Recommended retail price of the goods.

salesPrice.description: This is the unit net price that will appear on invoice lines when a product is added to an invoice line.

barCode.description: String representation of a machine readable barcode symbol that represents this product.

barred.description: If this value is true, then the product can no longer be sold, and trying to book an invoice with this product will not be possible.

lastUpdated.description: The last time the product was updated, either directly or through inventory changed. The date is formatted according to ISO-8601.

invoices.description: A collection of convenience links to invoices that contains this product.

drafts.description: A unique reference to the draft invoices containing this product.

booked.description: A unique reference to the booked invoices containing this product.

inventory.description: A collection of properties that are only applicable if the inventory module is enabled.

available.description: The number of units available to sell. This is the difference between the amount in stock and the amount ordered by customers.

inStock.description: The number of units in stock including any that have been ordered by customers.

orderedByCustomers.description: The number of units that have been ordered by customers, but haven't been sold yet.

orderedFromSuppliers.description: The number of units that have been ordered from your suppliers, but haven't been delivered to you yet.

packageVolume.description: The volume the shipped package makes up.

grossWeight.description: The gross weight of the product.

netWeight.description: The net weight of the product.

inventoryLastUpdated.description: The last time this product was updated with regards to inventory.

unit.description: A reference to the unit this product is counted in.

self.description: A unique reference to the unit resource.

productGroup.description: A reference to the product group this product is contained within.

productGroupNumber.description: Unique number identifying the product group.

name.description: Descriptive name of the product group.

salesAccounts.description: A reference to the sales accounts in this product group resource.

products.description: A reference to the products in this product group resource.

inventoryEnabled.description: States if the product group is inventory enabled or not.

accrual.description: A reference to the accrual account this product group is connected to.

accountNumber.description: Unique number identifying the accruals account.

accountType.description: The type of account in the chart of accounts.

balance.description: The current balance of the accruals account.

draftBalance.description: The current balance of the account including draft (not yet booked) entries.

barred.description: Shows if the account is barred from being used.

blockDirectEntries.description: Determines if the account can be manually updated with entries.

contraAccount.description: The default contra account of the account.

accountNumber.description: Account number of the contra account.

self.description: The unique self link of the contra account.

debitCredit.description: Describes the default update type of the account.

vatAccount.desciption: The default VAT code for this account.

vatCode.description: The VAT code of the VAT account for this account.

self.description: The unique self link of the VAT code.

accountsSummed.description: An array of the account intervals used for calculating the total for this account.

fromAccount.description: The first account in the interval.

accountNumber.description: Account number of the first account in the interval.

self.description: The unique self link of the first account in the interval.

toAccount.description: The last account in the interval.

accountNumber.description: Account number of the last account in the interval.

self.description: The unique self link of the last account in the interval.

totalFromAccount.description: The account from which the sum total for this account is calculated.

accountNumber.description: Account number of the first account.

self.description: The unique self link of the first account.

accountingYears.description: A link to a list of accounting years for which the account is usable.

self.description: A unique reference to the accruals account resource.
A unique reference to the product group resource.

departmentalDistribution.description: A departmental distribution defines which departments this entry is distributed between. This requires the departments module to be enabled.

departmentalDistributionNumber.description: A unique identifier of the departmental distribution.

self.description: A unique reference to the departmental distribution resource.
A unique reference to this product resource.
